00030 void Beeper::beep( int frequency, int length ) {
00031         pthread_t t;
00032         beep_t buffer = beep_t(frequency,length);//This may be a problem taking the address of a local
00033         pthread_create( &t, NULL, Beeper::beepi, &buffer );
00034         pthread_detach( t );
00035 
00036 }
00037 
00038 void * Beeper::beepi( void * data ) {
00039         fprintf(stdout, "beep\n");
00040         //system("beep");
00041         int fd = open( "/dev/console", O_RDONLY );
00042         beep_t * thisBeep = ((beep_t*)data);
00043         int arg = ((thisBeep->length)<<16)+(1193180/(thisBeep->frequency));
00044         ioctl(fd, KDMKTONE,arg);
00045         fprintf(stdout, "beep done\n");
00046         pthread_exit(NULL);
00047         return NULL;
00048 }
